resources.string:
This game is played between 2 players.The player writing name in Player X block will be playing from the X side and the likewise the second player will be playing from the O side.

 FIRST TURN:
 The first turn of the first game will be always given to the Player X and for the text matches the first turn will be given alternatively between Player X and Player O.The yellow color above your name depicts whose turn it is to play.

 HOW TO WIN:
 The first player to have his side marked on the 3 columns ,horizontally,vertically or diagonally wins the match.

You can play as many matches as you wish before quiting to increase your scores against your opponent.

 BEST OF LUCK!!
